website_summaries.verdict: Owners love it for its looks and high quality construction, but it is not practical for consumers who don't plan to purchase the entire system.
pros: Beautiful, solid craftsmanship with brass dispenser and contemporary finish
We love its smooth swivel spout and auto shutoff lever
cons: Faucet unit only – requires InSinkErator hot water tank and filtration system, making it an overall expensive choice

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this model, but had to return it. It looks like a quality product, but I couldn't use it because it does not work if you have 'chilled' water going into the cold side. The reason is because there is only one cold feed for - both hot & cold into the faucet, so you would be chilling the water that goes into the hot water tank also (thereby making it work harder, and have a slower recovery time). They have another model (2 handles) that accommodates that (having separate feeds into the faucet. You also have to push the handle - 'downward' before you can direct it to hot 'or' cold.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This piece is quality! It’s absolutely stunning and sleek! So much better than the cheaper alternatives. Has a kid safety feature that doesn’t allow you to just push it back for hot water. You have to press the handle down and then push it back! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mia B

customer_reviews.title: I totally love this faucet !!
customer_reviews.text: I had a electric operated European faucet for 4 years but it broke due to the water leak inside of the faucet lines, which never expected for this new Insinkerator faucet. The new design is very sophisticated as well as my pricy old faucet. The price is 1/4 of it. My plumber easily removed the old faucet with electric box and replaced it. I got more smoothe flow of water (one line for hot water and regular cold line was hooked up to Insinkerator chilled water tank, which works great. It had to warm up the water from chilled water tank, which used more electric but I’m still totally sarisfied!
customer_reviews.author: smile beauty tx

customer_reviews.title: Great to have
customer_reviews.text: I drink a lot of hot teas and this is a wonderful thing to have, as I'm not one for the stove top kettle. Has filter and temperature adjustment in unit below sink (purchase separately in addition to faucet.). I wanted the handle on the left and was able to install it that way. Of the many 'gadgets' and appliances, this is my favorite. Very quick and convenient. Note the H model is hot only while this HC has filtered cold as well.
customer_reviews.author: JSQ98

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful faucet
customer_reviews.text: Our previous InSinkErator instant water faucet with two separate tabs for hot/cold finally stopped working. The hot water would get stuck in the ON position. After a bit of research, we decided to replace it with this model. So glad we did! This is very sturdy and nice looking. To turn on the water you push down (slightly) on the lever while pushing back for hot or pulling forward for cold. This is a nice feature, for child safety and just to keep you from bumping the hot water on. Love this faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Jan M.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality; Heavy Duty; Modern Look;
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews but this hot water dispenser faucet deserves it. If you are looking for a higher quality product than the ones at Lowes, this is it. At 400-475, it's high priced but for the finish and modern look, you will be happy. The build quality is much better than the combo sets. Nice and heavy feel. Dispenses larger amount of water than the smaller cheaper ones. Water flows smoothly. Easy to install, takes about 15-20min. Note, this does not include the hot water tank. That's sold separately. Good Luck.
customer_reviews.author: HKN

customer_reviews.title: but that's fine. Really I can't picture home life without constant ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this installed in my kitchen for over 2 years now and it's still working perfectly. The 'cold' is just room temp, but that's fine. Really I can't picture home life without constant access to steam water now. Not only is it great for quick starting a boiling pot of water for cooking and making tea, but another great use is for helping with rinsing off sticky stuff before putting an item in the dishwasher. I use it constantly and really miss it when I'm using someone else's kitchen and it's missing.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Hekimian

customer_reviews.title: nice faucet, but worth the premium?
customer_reviews.text: it's a nice faucet and it works great so far (had it in for roughly one month of daily use). it's a pretty imposing size, I recommend measuring so you know what you're getting and whether or not it will look good next to your existing faucet. as far as the cost?; like I said it's a nice product, but I don't think it's worth the cost premium over the other more affordable models (which I had previously). I'm really glad I picked this up on a sale.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Nice and pricey, but worth the extra dollars for the matching looks and swing-a-way head
customer_reviews.text: This is a great instant hot water dispenser... pricey $$$, but great construction and it really matches the regular kitchen faucet. I love the fact that the head is made to swing side to side. I've previously owned the Franke Little Butler, but it's head was stationary (same with the older (different) model of the InSinkErator. This way I can swing the head completely out of the way if I'm washing a BIG pot. No issue of splattering that some have mentioned. A little bit of instruction need for guest who have never seen this unit before (you must push the lever down first, then you can push/pull it to get water)
customer_reviews.author: Fongpay

customer_reviews.title: Indulge Yourself
customer_reviews.text: We've just installed a new unit with faucet. We had one of these years ago, but the tank rusted out and we didn't replace it. The new unit has a filter, which is nice...and speeds coffee prep by 4 minutes/day. The faucet is very handy...much nicer than the one we had years ago. These units are an indulgence...and easy to get used to. Just don't know about the service life, but we're using it every day.
customer_reviews.author: stuffwrangler

customer_reviews.title: My absolutely loves this faucet and it looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to replace the leaky cheap faucet provided in the previous SST insinkerator hot water tap system. I did not experience any leaks in the under sink water tank, but I replaced it with the newer 3 yr warranty unit anyway, after hearing others complain about the previous unit. I figured that going to the trouble to replace this faucet, might as well replace the tank too while I have the system torn apart. To my surprise this system installed much easier than I expected. My absolutely loves this faucet and it looks and works great!
customer_reviews.author: tony maryfield

customer_reviews.title: Nice Addition To Our Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a little shocked by the cost of this item, but it seemed to be the going cost for something like this, so we made the purchase. We liked the fact it was hot and cold and we use the cold function more for our drinking water since it is filtered - but the hot feature does come in handy. Looks great in our new kitchen and installation was simple.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Manley

customer_reviews.title: Filtered hot and cold water at your fingertips.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Great design. But definitely add the filter so that you get filtered hot and cold water. After contemplating self installation, I decided to hire a local plumber to install. Glad I did, since the installation was not as easy as it looked.
customer_reviews.author: Rodan

customer_reviews.title: Love my instant hot water
customer_reviews.text: Love this faucet and I love Insinkerator. I took a star off because this faucet is way more expensive than their others and they didn't have a finish that matches my Delta faucet in Arctic Stainless. I thought it would be close but it's really not. Looks okay enough though.
customer_reviews.author: justinetn

customer_reviews.title: Very large!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a chrome handle to match a nickel faucet. Quite large for a secondary dispenser. If you have one of the huge industrial type kitchen faucets it will go well, but anything else may be visually overwhelmed.
customer_reviews.author: Al SwansonTop Contributor: Arduino

customer_reviews.title: Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older "two handle" unit with this one. It hangs over the sink allowing easier filling of water. Also, the; back for hot - forward for cold, is really cool. European style I guess? Easy to install with the filter inline. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Shleets

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to purchase this because it was so much more expensive than others. However, it is worth the price! The quality is excellent. It looks beautiful. I like that you have to push a small button on top to activate and when you let go of the handle it automatically turns off. That is a great safety feature.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful faucet for hot and cold.
customer_reviews.text: We added a new filter and wanted cold and hot. This was a direct replacement for their hot water faucet. It looks and works great. I was surprised when opening not to find a new heater as this as an expensive item! Still it was as described.
customer_reviews.author: Martin D.

customer_reviews.title: make sure you know what parts you need before you order
customer_reviews.text: It matched my main faucet in the kitchen. Nice looking. The bad part is the hot water side continues spurting water after you turn it off. Also after ordering the faucet we found our heater was not compatible with the new faucet so we had to order a new heater and a filter. Heaters are not sold separately. Cost me twice as much because I had to order the filter to get the heater.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Jauer

customer_reviews.title: VERY Nice but Pricey
customer_reviews.text: VERY nice! This beats the faucets that are included with the InstaHot kits hands-down but quite pricey. HINT: Watch for Amazon Warehouse Deal.
customer_reviews.author: TheBIGe

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a Good Kitchen Addition
customer_reviews.text: We previously had a single hot water faucet for our Instahot hot water dispenser and we just had a reverse osmosis (RO) filter installed. We wanted the RO water to be both hot and cold, so we bought this filter. Wow! We are impressed with the sturdiness of the construction, its appearance, and its 5 year warranty. With the feel of this faucet, I don't expect to have to have it replaced in the near future, but, if it does stop working, the 5 year in your home warranty will certainly be a great thing. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pro ShopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice fixture, needs some planning on install.
customer_reviews.text: This was probably one of the better quality fixtures I could find that matched the main faucet. Be advised that you probably ought to purchase both the fixture and the heater that goes with it in order to get all the proper parts. Also be advised that there is enough room between the mounting hole in the sink or counter and any wall or back splash. Otherwise you will have issues pushing the handle all the way back.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoors Handyman

customer_reviews.title: WATER FLOW TOO HARD
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bulky but the main issue is the water flow - even turned down by the plumber it's hard to regulate and it comes out too hard - splashes onto the countertop that I have to wipe up each time I use the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: E. Levin

customer_reviews.title: Made in Taiwan.
customer_reviews.text: it would seem to me a high precision instrument such as this with such a high price tag would be made here in America.
customer_reviews.author: tim walker

customer_reviews.title: Looks aren't everything
customer_reviews.text: We have had the insta hot water for 15 years and love it. We recently replaced our kitchen counters and sink and wanted the more sleek looking dispenser. When inSinkErator designed this they must have forgotten the quality aspect. It looks great but drips water for at least 30 seconds after it is used. The originally model never did that. Wish I had that one back.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great (but a tad spendy)
customer_reviews.text: The faucet is very high quality and performs exactly as advertised. The only reason I have for four (rather than five) stars is cost... although it’s excellent, it SHOULD be for the price.
customer_reviews.author: William Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good product and look nice
customer_reviews.text: I like this mode more than the other insink hot-cold model. Look very nice. Easy to install. The old model can be stuck after 2-3 years. Hopefully this one lasts longer since the valve made of cerami as claimed.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: This piece of hardware gets a workout in our busy family kitchen. It is truly well designed and delivers the water at such a faster rate than our old unit that it makes filling a pot for pasta or six glasses of water for a meal so easy. I really like how the hot water lever won't stay on unless you hold it on so that my kids don't get scalded using it. It looks great too. One thing to be aware of is that the heating unit we had didn't work with it so the plumber I had install it sold me a new heating unit which increased the cost a bit. Totally recommend buying this unit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Burford

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service. First installed by my contractor and would not stop streaming. Customer service sent a new product and a plumber to install. Plumber recognized it was not installed properly and advised contractor how to fix mistake. Now works great. Great company.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Heulitt, MD

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife, Happy Life - Uses This Everyday
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Installed next to our kitchen sink faucet and you don't even notice it's there really. The boiling hot water is perfect for making a quick cup of tea (my wife drinks tea morning and evening) and for making instant soups, thinning out sauces while cooking, making hot chocolate, sanitizing baby bottles, water bottle parts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Ouch.
customer_reviews.text: WOW, THIS IS PRICEY, but our reasoning was we're dealing with extremely hot temperatured water, and why risk any bursting or leaking with a substandard faucet. It was painful to pay, but am hoping we're in for several years of good use with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mich Again

customer_reviews.title: Nice faucet that delivers both hot and cold water
customer_reviews.text: It is so cool to have boiling water at the touch of a lever. This faucet delivers both boiling (hot enough for coffee or tea) and cool water. I like the color code that tells you which way is the hot water and the cold water.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: Really classy. My plumber was blown away by its elegance. Buyer beware though, you must order the other part. This is separate from the bowl or whatever they call it. Don't go on the cheap with these. They just don't last. Hopefully this one will.
customer_reviews.author: ManyHummingbirds

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the best addition to our kitchen remodel
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the best addition to our kitchen remodel. At first planning, we weren't sure we wanted or needed one that was filtered and had both hot and cold. Wrong! Absolutely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: flygirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice styling, safe to use.
customer_reviews.text: I had my contractor install this for my new house. The styling is nice. Compared to previous Insta-Hots, it is a lot less likely that someone will turn on the hot water and burn themselves. You press the handled down and back for hot or down and towards you for filtered cold water. So far, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: MisterBee

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the Grohe 31378000 Minta Pull-down Spray Head Kitchen Faucet to match this side-by-side and both look great in my ki
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and looks stellar. I purchased the Grohe 31378000 Minta Pull-down Spray Head Kitchen Faucet to match this side-by-side and both look great in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Very nice addition
customer_reviews.text: Love this faucet, its a good match for brushed stainless. Its a little pricey but I like that I can get both hot and cold water from it. In the picture its behind the big faucet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit would recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected but had to have a plumber install it. He had to use parts off of his truck because not all connection fittings were included.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A Walker

customer_reviews.title: Works great; industrial style
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly and have no problems with the faucet itself. I gave it four stars due to the industrial look because it was really the only one we could find for hot water. Other faucets that offered cold and hot dispensing had designs that were not so industrial looking.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Sputtering fix
customer_reviews.text: If temperature is turned to maximum, it sputters dangerously. Turning it down a bit stops it, but at the cost of max temp. Still at an acceptable temp of 185
customer_reviews.author: R. Klumph

customer_reviews.title: Not as great of quality as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I don't hate this product, but for the amount I paid, I assumed it would be better quality. First off, the sink head is hard to move back and forth and it always wants to return to the middle. See video.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful faucet.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a open box item but it was perfect. The only negative is SUPRISE, you still need to buy the tank/heater. A little pricier than I had expect but looks and works beautifully. They also make a more efficient filter I will purchase when it is time to replace.
customer_reviews.author: D. M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this faucet. I had the old one and thought I wouldn't like it as much. I appreciate the safety feature of having to push the faucet down before turning on the hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J. Rider

customer_reviews.title: Did not keep.
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. Found a better one at a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Covino

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and high-quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful device worth the money seems high-quality unfortunately only works with insinker rater insta hot water dispenser. We did set it up to a different brand water filter (multipure) which works fine. We also have insta hot connected to Multipure too.
customer_reviews.author: RCG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our kitchen. We love the instant hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Careey

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I have been looking at this for some years. Always felt it was too pricey. Had to remodle after a tornado and I splurged and glad I did. Use it every day for filter and hot water. Looks really nice and it works awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley G. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great great great
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm and matches with my other faucet perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Kristy M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I use it all the time for tea and oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: JDeL

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Well made.  Nice design.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Well made. Nice design. Design works pretty well with Grohe 33330001 Eurodisc Single-handle Dual Pull-Out Spray Kitchen Faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptic

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fixture
customer_reviews.text: Finally got this installed. Clean, simple design. Works great. Worth the extra $ for sturdy metal fixture. A+
customer_reviews.author: FatDave

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Faucet was very nice and well built. Had a insinkerator before and the quality and working mechanism in this is far better.
customer_reviews.author: Jared DeBie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent filtered water!
customer_reviews.text: Filtered water hot or cool on demand. Beautiful finish in brushed nickel. Nice modern looking design. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Verna R.

customer_reviews.title: Insinkerator faucet excellent fit.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know incinerator had a faucet with one handle for both hot and cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's been great. Simple design and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: It's been great. Simple design and simple to use. The facet,do not take up that much room under the sink which is a huge bonus. Its a great buy with young babies in the house to quickly warm up bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Dara

customer_reviews.title: Love instant hot water!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new instant hot water! I have never had one before and I am a tea drinker so I use it everyday. I am glad I splurged on this one because the shape matches my main faucet and they look great together! I am thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Goes with my new faucet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Goes with my new faucet, sink and countertop beautifully. Very pricey, but quality.
customer_reviews.author: rdlink

customer_reviews.title: This is great and saves on all that bottle water hassle
customer_reviews.text: The initial cost is a little steep, but in the long run it saves you money and your back from caring water bottles. I love having filtered hot water at your finger tips for all kind of uses. It was suggested to me in my other house about 10 years ago and now I can't see living without it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and works well
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and works well. like not having to refill the hot pot and no extra room on counter.always hot and ready to use
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and contemporary style is attractive. Love the ability to get both hot and cold filtered water in one convenient faucet. So easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Best water flow of any dispenser so far!
customer_reviews.text: We have had several styles of got water dispensers obvwr the years. I was astounded who I saw the incredible flow of hot water rather than the usual trickle-cold water too. I don't see a single flaw with this dispenser and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: sbh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very happy with the design and function of this. especially like the "lock" feature to protect from accidental burning.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine K.

customer_reviews.title: Satin Nickel finish?
customer_reviews.text: While this faucet looks great, and I am sure it will function just fine once installed, I am saddened by the fact that this satin nickel finish does not match the satin nickel finish on the Artisan sink faucet I purchased that will be installed next to it.
customer_reviews.author: JKAP

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works with Quick and Hot, matches Delta faucet, way too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I can't figure out why this costs more than my entire instant hot water system (including all-metal dispenser). But we were replacing the entire kitchen, so I talked myself into it. The product photo shows this dispenser with the Delta 9159-AR-DST faucet, which it matches really well. Lowe's carries a very slightly different Delta faucet called Trask. I successfully installed this with the competing hot water system, the Quick and Hot, which I already had and which has better reviews than the InSinkErator one. This dispenser has a clear plastic vent tube that doesn't need to be connected to anything when used with the Quick and Hot.
customer_reviews.author: ArgentoSapiens

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: It leaked at the handle. And send a old unit that was made 2 years ago! I purchased it June 9th and it’s telling me I can’t return it!!!! Defective unit! Now what? I had to add a star to send this!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the look
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the look of this faucet. I had the older low faucet which I never liked when we moved in hear a year ago. I really like that I can swivel the faucet too and the height is SO much better. I wasn't sure I would like the child proof feature but I like it. It is very easy to turn on by just pushing down and turning on. In fact, I had a friend come to my house before replacing the old one and she burned herself. She said she "knew it was a hot faucet but didn't realize it was that hot".
customer_reviews.author: Love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Easy install took 15 minutes or less in the existing ...
customer_reviews.text: Matches the existing faucets in our new home. Works well with the Instant hot water generator. Easy install took 15 minutes or less in the existing soap dispenser hole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One the Best Purchases Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this hot/cold filtered dispenser. Yes is was expensive and worth the money. I use it everyday, several times a day. There are occasions when you first open the hot water that it might spit a bit (especially if it hasn't been used recently)and compared to going through the hassle of boiling water this is great. The quality and finish are beautiful and matches the faucet we have. Installation was simple. One note: It is not the color of a stainless steel sink, it is a more pewter satin finish but I have a black cast iron sink and it looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: hope4unme

customer_reviews.title: This hot water dispenser is far too large for our ...
customer_reviews.text: This hot water dispenser is far too large for our kitchen. Make sure to check the dimensions prior to purchase. I WILL say that our return was incredibly simple.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation. I love the option of having both ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. I love the option of having both hot and cold filtered water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and is a nice addition to the kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, and is a nice addition to the kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. No problems. Just a bit pricey compared to alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: wintermute

customer_reviews.title: works and looks great. I know hot water dispensers don't last long
customer_reviews.text: Just installed; works and looks great. I know hot water dispensers don't last long, so am hoping this one hangs in there for at least a few years. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vitalogy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically Pleasing Hot Water Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: More expensive, but if you use your hot water dispenser a lot and care about the way it looks, you will love this. It's handsome, and you have to push and pull in order to dispense which is great, especially for guests / new users. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Going strong
customer_reviews.text: I know this is pricey but the quality of the piece is worth it. We were remodeling the kitchen and I talked the wife into it. This is now her favorite thing in the new question.
customer_reviews.author: Sirwilliam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Shopped around at local stores. Way cheaper for the exact same thing. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Installs easy. Hot and cold water dispensing convenient
customer_reviews.text: Matched facet perfectly. Installs easy. Hot and cold water dispensing convenient. Happy wife happy life! :)
customer_reviews.author: Brian in California

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: This was the most expensive faucet I have every purchased. I am very happy with the quality however. I guess you do get what you pay for. Installation was a breeze. If you have a standard 3/8 fitting on your cold water sink supply, get the "Add a Tap" fitting available at any home store instead of the "saddle" valve.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: Owned this for two years, use it every day, and it has not failed me once. Looks great, works well, what more can you say? Perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D Holman

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dispenser as a replacement for the HC1100SN which I had two (replaced under warranty) over a period of six years. As other reviewers mentioned, the cold water valve stuck in the open position on both of them; Insinkerator does not sell a repair kit even though it would be a easy fix. Since this dispenser has a different design I'm hoping to have better luck with this one.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best model out of all of them. Beautiful design too.
customer_reviews.author: danna

customer_reviews.title: Hot Water Dispensor
customer_reviews.text: Love the contemporary look and feel of this faucet. It blends right in with my other fixtures. Nice smooth action and durable finish.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Clean sleek modern design. A boiling hot cup of tea in seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a hot/cold dispenser that was leaking. I like the quality, the swivel top and the way the hot/cold valve works. I especially like the fact you can have the cold water on without having to hold down the lever. It was fairly easy to install as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Installation instructions were very good; the unit was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Installation instructions were very good; the unit was easy to install; only one trip to Home Depot was required to purchase an appropriate adapter for our existing valve. Given the multitude of potential valves available, I do not blame InSinkErator for not providing any adapters with the unit. Love the heft feel and quality actuation of this dispenser. Looks great with a Grohe LadyLux faucet, too!
customer_reviews.author: C. Bender

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned it wouldn't fit our older Insinkerator water heater but it hooked right up works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Love it. Use it like crazy, had it for about 5 months now and there are no issues. Works great and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: It still looks new
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 3+ years and use it every day. It works perfectly and is the go-to for small amounts of hot water so I don't have to waste gallons to get to the hot just to rinse off the knife or peeler. Hot enough to brew tea. It still looks new, which is more than I can say for the previous three I've had over the last 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: d'Artagnan

customer_reviews.title: go with some other brand. any other brand
customer_reviews.text: i hate that you can only use their expensive faucets with their hot water heaters. the hoses are very short. i already had an existing hole in my countertop, and i had only one spot that i could get as close the faucet as possible. the would it have killed them to add a little bit of extra tubing to their proprietary design? i'll never buy insinkerator again.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: HOT STUFF, I would not be without this system
customer_reviews.text: I am reviewing the dispenser, not the Hot Water Tank. It is beautiful & matches our kitchen decor nicely. To operate, you push the handle down and away from you (a safety feature). The faucet arm is not stationary, but rotates from side to side. It is $$$ and I would have chosen another had it not fit in so well.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Burke

customer_reviews.title: ... dispenser just on time for Holiday and it works great!
customer_reviews.text: I received this hot water dispenser just on time for Holiday and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ramy Chanramy

customer_reviews.title: looks great but makes fizzing sounds almost every time after i ...
customer_reviews.text: looks great but makes fizzing sounds almost every time after i use the hot water. i think this is a pressure issue? the chrome also steams up after using the hot water. there have been a few times that after i turn it off, water spurts out into the sink about 30s to 1 minute later.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kat

customer_reviews.title: You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: When I initially opened the box, the dispenser looked larger than I expected. That is probably because the one that it was replacing was so small. Now that it is installed, I am thrilled with the look. It is easy to use, and fits beautifully with my existing faucet.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: much sturdier than the lever version we used for 12 years
customer_reviews.text: like the feel of the lever and how easy it is to operate, spout also rotates and looks great on the counter
customer_reviews.author: cc atl

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: The lines of this product are graceful. It is very sturdy. It does exactly what it is advertised to do. Truly do love it.
customer_reviews.author: L McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in my newly remodeled kitchen. The sleek design gives my sink clean lines. I love the child proof feature too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nadene Russell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great faucet. Works and looks great. Matches the finish and style of my Grohe kitchen sink faucet.
customer_reviews.author: W. Pollak

customer_reviews.title: It's only the dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: the product is very well made and high quality materials.....I am replacing an older unit that cost me 200 for dispenser AND tank...I did not read the fine print that the tank is sold separately....my fault...but I assumed for this price it was....I look forward to an issue free unit with the stainless tank and filtered water....after 500$ plus.....
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: We love it and have quite a few compliments. Very sharp looking faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Lord

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Drsign and Function
customer_reviews.text: We have a new born baby so the hot water dispenser is GREAT to warm his bottles. Plus we use it for coffee and tea. ;-) The safety feature is nice, too. You have to push the lever down to turn on the hot water. The under cabinet heater was easy to install and didn't take up too much space. The best thing for us is the convenience of having the filtered insta-hot and cold water but we also like the look of the faucet because it matches our main sink faucet. That being said, this fixture is larger than most other standard fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Kim

product_meta.title: InSinkErator F-H3300SN Modern Instant Hot Water Dispenser, Satin Nickel
product_meta.description:
Color:Satin Nickel| Style:Hot Only

The InSinkErator Indulge Modern F-H3300 Instant Hot Water Dispenser Faucet in Satin Nickel offers stunning clean lines, blending efficiency and style to coordinate with today’s finest kitchens. It's always ready to dispense near-boiling water at your command.

The Indulge Modern instant hot water faucet features a sleek, swivel spout and unique single-handle design which provide a minimalistic look. Its solid brass construction offers unrivaled quality for durability and corrosion resistance. The hot lever features a convenient instant self-closing valve that automatically shuts off to ensure safe use.

The InSinkErator Indulge Modern instant hot water tap is available in Chrome and Satin Nickel finishes to perfectly complement your kitchen. It's ideal for instantly preparing gourmet coffee and hot tea, steaming vegetables in a flash, warming baby bottles in seconds, removing candle wax from candle holders, cleaning without the use of harsh chemicals, removing stubborn lids and labels, and so much more.

The Indulge Modern instant hot water faucet is to be used in combination with the InSinkErator HWT-F1000S Hot Water Tank and Filtration System (sold separately) for filtered near-boiling water right when you need it. The faucet requires a standard 1-3/8-inch to 1-1/2-inch diameter hole for installation with a maximum counter thickness of 3 inches.

InSinkErator covers the Indulge Modern instant hot water faucet with an exclusive 5-Year We Come to You In-Home Full Service Limited Warranty. This warranty includes free house calls (including parts and labor) for the entire warranty period. Capacity: 2.5 Litre Stainless Steel Tank 



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This InSinkErator Indulge Modern instant hot water dispenser provides filtered, 200-Degree-F near-boiling water for a variety of uses and is perfect for any cooking connoisseur. The Indulge Modern instant hot water dispenser features stunning, clean lines, blending efficiency and style. The faucet features a ceramic disc valve that will resist corrosion. The required hole size is a standard sink hole, which is 1-3/8 by 1 -1/2-Inch in diameter. The dispenser requires a minimum of 2-1/2-Inch of space from the center of the hole to the backsplash. The maximum counter thickness is 3-Inch. Use it to make tea, prepare pasta, loosen jar lids, warm baby food, clean crusty pans, melt chocolate and warm ice cream scoops.
feature_bullets: Modern instant hot water faucet blending efficiency and style with swivel spout for convenience; unique single handle design
Hot and cold water faucet only; for use with the re-engineered InSinkErator HWT-F1000S Hot Water Tank and Filtration System (sold separately)
Instant hot water dispenser faucet has durable solid brass construction; hot lever automatically shuts off while the Stay-On cool lever remains on for easy use
Ideal for instantly making hot and cold beverages, steaming vegetables, cleaning dishes, warming baby bottles, and so much more; Required hole diameter: 1 3/8" - 1 1/2" (standard)
Exclusive 5-Year We Come to You In-Home Full Service Limited ; That means we come to you if your water dispenser needs service within the period
